name: Fatality (Dreemore)
description:
Highlight Everything below me

A short game about surviving against tough obstacles whilst also dying as much as you possibly can. (Honestly, I don't think it's even possible to win).

WASD to move for player 2

Arrows to move for player 1

Mouse to select

Enter the door to proceed to the next level

Don't die lol

I made this in about 1 day because i wasnt focused whoops
